traits.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

traits.name: Heated Weapons
entries: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make tail attacks against other targets.
